name: TaskMerge
signal_source: Workplace studies show 20% of cognitive capacity lost during context switching with average 9.5 minutes to regain productive workflow
description: Task consolidation app that groups related activities to minimize context switching and maintain cognitive flow
target_user: Professional workers overwhelmed by fragmented task management across multiple apps and platforms
pain_point_evidence: Research shows workers spend 59 minutes daily searching for information across different apps with 44% unable to track work duplication
core_loop: Smart grouping by context and priority
Minimize tool switching during work blocks
differentiation: Task batching vs. linear task management, focuses on cognitive efficiency over feature richness
subscription_fit: Premium includes advanced integrations, team coordination, and detailed productivity analytics

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic batching, premium for integrations and team features
